entry.title: Current Conditions: Mist, 0.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Cape Dorset Airport 4:33 PM EDT Sunday 15 May 2016
Condition: Mist
Temperature: 0.3°C
Pressure: 101.3 kPa
Visibility: 6.4 km
Humidity: 98 %
Dewpoint: 0.0°C
Wind: E 11 km/h

entry.title: Sunday night: A few showers. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Rain showers with risk of freezing rain. Fog patches. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Sunday 15 May 2016

entry.title: Monday: Chance of drizzle mixed with freezing drizzle. High zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of drizzle or freezing drizzle. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. High zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Sunday 15 May 2016

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of freezing drizzle. Temperature steady near minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of freezing drizzle changing to 60 percent chance of flurries after midnight. Temperature steady near minus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Sunday 15 May 2016
